amendatorysection.catchline: Township counties without county road unit system; sections applicable.
amendatorysection.para: The provisions of sections 39-1519 to 39-1527 shall relate only to those counties under the township organization not operating under a county road unit system as provided in sections 39-1513 to 39-1518.

crossreference.para: For other applicable provisions in township counties not having road unit system, see sections 23-228 and 23-265.
